name: entreating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
acting or done in an emotional way that shows that you very much want to persuade someone to do something: She looked at him with entreating eyes as she sang. He spoke in an entreating voice, and it was hard to refuse. Synonyms
beseeching
pleading Related word
entreat
More examplesFewer examplesHe opened the door with an entreating look at her.There was a knock, and I heard an entreating voice outside the door.She heard her mother, sounding angry, and her brother, sounding entreating.I looked into the dog's entreating eyes and couldn't ignore him.
